Reviews.Title: nice product
Reviews.Author: Raymond Tran "A.B"
Reviews.Content: arrived on time. really nice bag. however, the tripod is poor quality. easy to broken. btw i really like the bag

Reviews.Title: reasonably compact with space for ipad
Reviews.Author: M. Collins
Reviews.Content: Works ok. Looks more like a purse than I expected and the buckle on the front seems unlikely to be durable.
